description:
Classic Slot Lovers Rejoice!

VegasMagic™ Real Casino Slots brings over 50+ Deluxe Mechanical Reel Slot Machines from the world of the Las Vegas casino floor to your favorite mobile device!

Play for FREE for hours on end to help you relax and forget all your worries… all you’ve got to do is press SPIN and let Lady Luck take care of the rest! 🍀

★ Huge variety of vintage 3 Reel and 5 Reel Stepper Slots to choose from.
★ Loose slots – favorable odds that let you maximize your game time.
★ This is ad supported (we need to eat!) – but any purchase removes ads.
★ Lots of ways to earn Free Coins – so if you don’t want to you don’t need to make any purchases to play.
★ Play online or offline. No internet connection needed unlike most other slots games, so that you can play on a plan, in the subway or anywhere at all!
★ Double Win / Gamble Feature available – Double, Triple and even Quadruple your wins!
★ Mega Jackpots on Selected Machines!

If you love VegasMagic™ then PLEASE let your friends know about it… and we always love getting a rating or review (yes, we read them all! )

► Support Email: feedback@interlabarts.com
► Feel free to email us if you have any issues or suggestions for improvement.

VegasMagic™ Real Casino Slots is the best & most fun new casino game of 2017!


INSTALL and start playing now FREE!
